timeline.bodyText: Please remove this one. This is more like Rename options fix as well.
timeline.author: liach
YanisBft

replies.bodyText:
There is still a field with that name in PiglinEntity, because :thonkjang: forgot to remove it. I would also rename the field in the subclass to OLD_IMMUNE_TO_ZOMBIFICATION, with a javadoc comment saying how it's one that Mojang forgot to remove (see the one in ZombieEntity).
Also while you're at it, PiglinEntity.dancing needs capitalizing.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Not used as of 1.16.2, superceded by the field in AbstractPiglinEntity
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Unused as of 1.16.2, superseded by {@link AbstractPiglinEntity#IMMUNE_TO_ZOMBIFICATION}.
          
      
    
    
  

Just better phrasing
timeline.author: YanisBft
